title: How to Check the Weather on an iPhone or iPod Touch

steps.headline: Swipe down from the top of your screen.
steps.description: This will open the Notification Center. You can open the Notification Center from most screens.

steps.headline: Look for the weather information.
steps.description: It will be displayed beneath the time date. You should see a weather icon and a description of the day's weather. This may take a moment to load.

steps.headline: Tap the "Weather" app to open it.
steps.description: It can be found on the first home page of your device. You may need to tap the "Home button" to return your device quickly to this screen. If you are using an iPod touch, you will need to have a network connection.

steps.headline: Look at your local weather.
steps.description: Your device will attempt to find your current location using the Location Services. This will be the first entry in the Weather app.

steps.headline: Tap a location for more details.
steps.description: You can tap any location in your weather list for more details and a forecast. Tap the "List" button to return to the location list.

steps.headline: Tap the "+" button to add another location.
Search for a location.
steps.description: You can search by city, zip code, or airport.

text: Using the Notification Center Swipe down from the top of your screen. This will open the Notification Center. You can open the Notification Center from most screens. Tap the "Today" button.  Look for the weather information. It will be displayed beneath the time date. You should see a weather icon and a description of the day's weather. This may take a moment to load. Using the Weather App Tap the "Weather" app to open it. It can be found on the first home page of your device. You may need to tap the "Home button" to return your device quickly to this screen. If you are using an iPod touch, you will need to have a network connection. Look at your local weather. Your device will attempt to find your current location using the Location Services. This will be the first entry in the Weather app. Tap a location for more details. You can tap any location in your weather list for more details and a forecast. Tap the "List" button to return to the location list. Tap the "+" button to add another location.  Search for a location. You can search by city, zip code, or airport.
